description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance) is a component of Khyber Pukhtunkhwa Education Sector Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £41,272,589. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Teacher training, Educational research, Primary education, Secondary education. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Ecorys, Ernst & Young, Ernst & Young Pakistan, Glow Consultants, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 26-07-2011 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
